messages.subject: slings and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: We re getting ready to take a two-week trek to see family in Austin TX... taking a southern route from Maryland through Virginia, Tennesee, Arkansas... then
messages.messageBody:
" We're
getting ready to take a two-week trek to see family in Austin TX...
taking a southern route from Maryland through Virginia, Tennesee,
Arkansas... then to Austin... "

Well heck, if you just slipped a little further south as you wend towards TX, you could stop and say hi to us Pensacolians!:)
If you travel down through TN, then move towards the gulf, that'll put you right in line with Houston, an easy drive from here.

Ren

Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
